name: Candy Cave (rorzz)
description:
This game is made for Mini Jam 66.
You go down to the caves to mine some sweets.
The limitation was "Only 2 button presses", so I made  hte character jump instead of walking - this replaces 4 buttons (w, a, s, d) with 1 mouse click. But I didn't know that this limitation applies to the UI as well, although there are hypothetically 2 UI buttons in each scene, but this is not actually.
